content.raw: In @scpeters ' example that starts the simple HTTP server (python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000), is that supposed to be visible to the OCU in the "outside" world?  I tried connecting with a browser to the public IP of the field computer with http://54.183.68.246:8000 but I get no response.  Connected via SSH, it looks like everything is running properly in CloudSIM.
